description.narrative: Education in Emergencies, which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, children of basic and post-basic school age, especially girls, have increased and more equitable access to quality learning in a progressively strengthened education system, including in humanitarian situations

System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Proved progress towards integrating life skills and citizenship education within its curriculum and in schools through a series teacher trainings including Psycho-Social Support particularly for the re-taken areas after years of conflict and violence. UNICEF conducted Positive Discipline training for teachers and social outreach activities on social cohesion. | Status:Discontinued | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Emergency response - Cluster coordination mechanism for education sector rating for the 7 core cluster functions (incl. accountability to affected populations)

actual.value: 2017:Cluster coordination mechanism for education sector functioning as expected.
